title: Unspecified Error occurred. please check logs for more information mac [SOLUTION]
body:
[SOLUTION] simply follow steps below

Close league if its active then follow steps below

**System Preferences > Network > Advanced > DNS**

**Change the DNS to 8.8.8.8** and you are ready to go!
Now Launch LoL and enjoy

replies.body: THIS IS NOT FUCKING SOLUTION DIDNT WORK AT FUCKING ALL FUCK YOU

The Mac client is extremely sensitive to unstable connections or brief disconnections from the platform. Changing your DNS to Google's public DNS servers will often resolve many issues with the Mac client. 

*Nice work, *GameAgi!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 
 ~**QUALITY POST**~
